text: is a railway station located in Sakkuru (咲来), Otoineppu, Nakagawa District (Teshio), Hokkaidō prefecture, and is operated by the Hokkaido Railway Company. ==Lines serviced== * Hokkaido Railway Company :* Sōya Main Line ==Adjacent stations== ==External links== *Ekikara Time Table - JR Sakkuru Station Category:Railway stations in Hokkaido Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1912
title: Sakkuru Station
